entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:24 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -39.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 01:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -39.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa steady
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -43.0°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:09 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:09 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:09 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
